title: Building a MASSIVE Bass Pond on a Goat Farm!

subtasks: Wake up and wait for varmints to come out.
Look for signs of coyotes or other predators.
Design and plan fishing pond area.
Feed goats and manage their diet.
Inspect building sites for fish pond and pool.
Scavenge for natural fish food (e.g., frogs, insects).
Pay attention to local wildlife (e.g., llamas, deer).
Address tick infestations in the area.
